duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage a team of sales professionals to achieve quarterly sales and expense objectives.
Recruit, develop, and retain an engaged, high-performing team that maximizes revenues and attains corporate objectives.
Spend a significant amount of time in the field with each sales representative to support their professional development needs.
Regularly connect with team members individually, via phone and in person, to discuss territory updates and progress towards goals.
Facilitate regular regional team meetings to discuss company/region updates, market information, share successes, and discuss learning opportunities.
Identify and develop working relationships with KOLs and key customers in their region's key accounts.
Develop excellence in product and procedure knowledge, maintains knowledge of the industry and the competition.
Maintain an active and ongoing commitment to compliance with all company policies and applicable federal, state, and local laws.
